column7: 1925 to the late thomas w. goforth and eva lawing goforth. she worked as a supervisor for the western carolina telephone company for over 20 years. louise enjoyed gardening and had a love of antiques. a faithful member of harmony grove baptist church
column8: she was always very involved in church activities. her husband
column10: preceded her in death. surviving her are her sister
column11: mildred goforth of marion; her sister-in-law
column13: marie dillingham. a funeral service will be held on sunday
column15: 2015 at 3:00 p. m. in the chapel of westmoreland funeral home in marion with rev. gary webb
column16: rev. jimmy upton and rev. chuck tripp officiating. the family will receive friends from 2:00 3:00 p. m. prior to the service at the funeral home. burial will follow in the harmony grove baptist church cemetery. flowers are acceptable and appreciated. those desiring to make a memorial contribution in her memory are encouraged to consider her church
